name: SwingSwing: Music Game
description:
***********************************
**AppShouter: "Each song has uniquely designed backgrounds, making the game visually fun, as well as fun to play. The design is simple and easy to follow, so anyone can pick up this game and start playing."
**Appyzilla: "Swing Swing Motion by Walkcinema looks to bring something
distinctive to the Music genre."
**Customer's Reviews:
*ithruyou- "I recommend this game for those who are sick of finger tapping
rhythm games and are finding a new type of rhythm action game."
*izzy_storm- "shows a fairly high quality and there is no hesitation in
recommending the game"
*jaybanana- "it's more dynamic than any other music tapping game! the interface is refreshing, and you can easily feel the mood and rhythm"

***********************************
Music & Rhythm Game

It’s time for you to show the world what you’ve got!
Go with the newly upgraded SwingSwing for a travel to the one and only

adventure to a whole new world!
The note patterns are three-dimensional; its far beyond you’re imaginations.

Songs:
1. Habanera Tango
2. Dancing Cat
3. Chopsticks
4. Twinkle Little star
5. Hokey Pokey
6. Ten Little Indians
7. Wild West
8. Dance of The Swans
9. San Sebastian
10. Turkish March
11. SwingSwing
12. La Campanella
13. Pathetique
14. Thunder Cat
15. Arirang
16. Havana
17. My girl
